name: focusforge
description: A production-grade discipline and daily focus web application for students to build consistency, track progress, and optimize their daily routines

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run verify
